oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Dion and Ann Nicholson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Dion and Ann Nicholson sitting in chairs. Dion Boone Nicholson was born July 26, 1837, and died August 11, 1922. He was the son of William J. Nicholson and Elizabeth Ann (Teasley) Nicholson. Ann Tennessee Nicholson was born December 12, 1849, and died September 29, 1930. She was the daughter of Gideon Austin Nicholson and Mary (Teasley) Nicholson.
